page.title: 09Horse Riding-Laughton Area
page.content: Horse riding is a very important leisure industry in our area. Many people own their own horses and there are many riding stables. Mrs. Green owns a stable in our area and she explained some important things to do with owning a riding stable. These are the most important. 1. Horse riding in our area is increasing because people seem to be working less hours and many are out of work. Also this is a very good area for riding. 2. Riding can be tailored to suit individual needs. Whether a person is experienced or not it can be exciting, relaxing, energetic, competitive, fast or slow. 3. The weather does not stop riding. It is just as enjoyable whether it is sunny or raining. Even in very cold weather, the rider keeps warm.
